Text: Is this the real show or not? Can you post info about it... maybe a bit more then "Complete 7 seasons."?

Yes, it is the real show: all the episodes that exist. I'm just uploading it because it's been a pain to get it, here or elsewhere: there were something like 2 seeds all over the web when I first got this.

Not sure what other info you need, and I can't edit the original information I added.
